item.title: MERRY CHRISTMAS! EKC 25.3 CHRISTMAS EDITION IS THE LATEST VERSION. STREAMS ARE VERY GOOD RIGHT NOW FOR SHOWS AND MOVIES. GAIA WHICH WAS THE LAST DEFAULT ADDON, HAS BEEN PLACED UNDER BACK UP. IT WORKS GREAT THERE WITH NO GLITCHES. 13 CLOWNS IS NOW DEFAULT AND SHORTCUTS. BACKUP OPTIONS ARE UNDER MOVIES AND SHOWS. THE NEW SOURCE/SCRAPER SEEMS TO BE MUCH QUICKER WITH THIS NEW SET UP.
DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM

SIGN UP FOR GEARS TV FOR A PREMIUM LIVE CONTENT. PLEASE WATCH THE DEMO VIDEO UNDER THE GEARS SECTION TO SEE IT IN ACTION. SIGN UP AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM/GEARSTV - THIS SERVICE IS AMAZING. GREAT GUIDE AS WELL.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT. HAPPY STREAMING
